question: Medicare
text:
Medicare
          
        
A federal health insurance program for people 65 and older and certain younger people with disabilities. Medicare also provides coverage for individuals with End-Stage Renal Disease (permanent kidney failure requiring dialysis or a transplant, sometimes called ESRD).
If you are enrolled in Medicare Part A or Part C, or are eligible for premium-free Medicare Part A, you are considered to have another source of comprehensive coverage, and will not be eligible for 
premium tax credits
 through Pennie. Visit 
Medicare.gov
 for more information about this program, including information about how to enroll.
